actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests, Family Farms, and Energy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
Subcommittee on Forests, Family Farms, and Energy

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a grant program to increase the international competitiveness of the forest products industries in the United States.

summary.text: Wood Products Export Act of 1992 - Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to make grants to five international forest products trade development centers located at universities in specified regions of the United States to: (1) assist them in increasing the international competitiveness of U.S. forest products; and (2) establish a network among them. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out a grant program to increase the international competitiveness of the forest products industries in the United States.
